data.title: Bollywood star Shah Rukh Khan world's fourth wealthiest actor
data.meta_description: Doha, Qatar: The celebrated Indian icon of Bollywood, Shah Rukh Khan, has emerged as the fourth wealthiest actor in the world, boasting a staggering n...
data.text:
Doha, Qatar: The celebrated Indian icon of Bollywood, Shah Rukh Khan, has emerged as the fourth wealthiest actor in the world, boasting a staggering net worth of $730 million.

According to latest stats published on the Edudwar website, ranking the richest actors globally.

Shah Rukh Khan shares this esteemed list with other Indian actors, Amitabh Bachchan and Salman Khan, who stand at 12th and 23rd positions respectively, with a net worth of $410 million and $350.

10 wealthiest actors worldwide:

1-Jerry Seinfeld

Leading the list with a net worth of $950 million.

American stand-up comedian renowned for his semi-fictional version in the sitcom 'Seinfeld,' which he created and wrote with Larry David.

2-Tyler Perry

With a net worth of $800 million.

American actor, writer, producer, and director.

Perry is best known for his creation and portrayal of the Madea character, a tough elderly black woman.

3-Dwayne Johnson

Also known as "The Rock," ties with Perry at $800 million.

The ex-professional wrestler turned actor is one of the biggest names in Hollywood, known for his roles in the 'Fast and Furious' franchise and other action-packed films.

4-Shah Rukh Khan

With a net worth of $730 million.

He has been India's reigning movie king for the past three decades.

Khan is often referred to as the "King of Bollywood," with over 80 Bollywood films credits to his name.

5-Tom Cruise

With a net worth of $620 million.

American actor and producer recognized for his roles in blockbuster hits like the 'Mission Impossible' movie series and 'Top Gun.'

6-George Clooney

With a net worth of $500 million.

American actor, filmmaker, and businessman.

He has been awarded three Golden Globe Awards and two Academy Awards for his performances in Hollywood.

7-Robert De Niro

With a net worth of $500 million.

American actor, producer, and director.

Recognized for his compelling performances in films like 'The Godfather Part II' and 'Raging Bull.'

8-Arnold Schwarzenegger

With a net worth of $450 million.

American Bodybuilder with Austrian roots turned actor turned politician.

Known as 'The Terminator', Schwarzenegger served as the Governor of California from 2003 to 2011.

9-Kevin Hart

With a net worth of $450 million

American comedian, TV host, and actor.

He has been in several successful films like 'Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle' and 'Night School.'

10-Adam Sandler

With a net worth of $440 million.

American actor, comedian, and film producer known for his comedic roles in films like 'Billy Madison,' 'Happy Gilmore,' and 'The Waterboy.'
